alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 2:43PM MST until February 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SATURDAY TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. The period of heaviest accumulation is expected between 11 PM Saturday through 11 AM Sunday. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Heber- Overgaard, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Sedona, Seligman and Williams. * WHEN...From 5 PM Saturday to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. Snow forecast from 5 PM Saturday to 5 PM Sunday: Doney Park 4 to 6 inches Flagstaff 7 to 11 inches Forest Lakes 8 to 12 inches Heber-Overgaard 3 to 5 inches Prescott 4 to 6 inches Prescott Valley 2 to 4 inches Sedona 2 to 4 inches Seligman 1 to 3 inches Williams 7 to 11 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains
